actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

official_title: To ensure that United States Government personnel, including members of the Armed Forces and contractors, assigned to United States diplomatic missions are given the opportunity to designate next-of-kin for certain purposes in the event of the death of the personnel.
short_title: US Navy SEAL SCPO Tyrone Snowden Woods Ceremony Invitee Act of 2015

summary.text:
US Navy SEAL SCPO Tyrone Snowden Woods Ceremony Invitee Act of 2015

This bill directs the Department of State to:

 prescribe a policy by which a member of a diplomatic mission may designate those next-of-kin who will be invited to, and be entitled to attend, any memorial service held to honor the member in the event of his or her death in service to the United States; and publicize such policy and make the appropriate forms available to each member of a diplomatic mission.

titles.title: US Navy SEAL SCPO Tyrone Snowden Woods Ceremony Invitee Act of 2015

To ensure that United States Government personnel, including members of the Armed Forces and contractors, assigned to United States diplomatic missions are given the opportunity to designate next-of-kin for certain purposes in the event of the death of the personnel.
